headerDisplay: [Homebridge](https://github.com/homebridge/homebridge) Support for [Interlogix](https://www.interlogix.com) Wireless Contact and Motion Sensors using [rtl_433](https://github.com/merbanan/rtl_433)

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

dontLearn.title: Disable Learning
dontLearn.description: When set, new devices will not be added to HomeKit as they're noticed.
